nnsec.server
Class WorkerFactory

java.lang.Object
  nnsec.server.WorkerFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.rmi.Remote, WorkerFactoryIFace
public class WorkerFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements WorkerFactoryIFace

WorkerFactory constructs new Worker objects, exports them and then returns an interface to this objects so that client can communicates with them.

Nested Class Summary
static class WorkerFactory.ConnectionException
          Exception thrown when trying to start to the server, and then some errors occur.

          Default constructor for the WorkerFactory.

Method that indicates if server accepts incoming calls.

Returns:
true if server accepts incoming calls, false otherwise.

setActive

public void setActive(boolean accept)
This method sets the ability of the server to accept incoming calls.

Parameters:
accept - true if the server will has to accept incoming calls. false otherwise.

createConnection

public void createConnection(int port,
                             java.lang.String identifier)
                      throws WorkerFactory.ConnectionException
This method permits to create connection with the server, then the client can retrieves an associated server part with which it can exploits the protocol.

Parameters:
port - registry server port.
identifier - server identifier (name used to bind the object in the rmi registry).
Throws:
WorkerFactory.ConnectionException - thrown when some errors occur connecting with the server.
